text: Jafar Sharif-Imami (; 9 September 1910 â€“ 16 June 1998) was an Iranian politician. He was the prime minister from 1960 to 1961 and again in 1978. He was a cabinet minister, president of the Iranian Senate, president of the Pahlavi Foundation. He was also the president of the Iran chamber of industries and mines during the reign of Shah Mohammad Reza Pahlavi. title: Jafar Sharif-Emami
